content: make gift-giving extra special with this adorable cat gift card holder crochet pattern perfect for birthdays holidays or just because this cute little project turns an ordinary gift card into a thoughtful handmade surprise ✨ pattern details * step-by-step written instructions us crochet terms * quick fun and beginner-friendly project * finished holder fits most standard-sized gift cards * use felt fabric paint ribbons etc to create custom cats for halloween christmas or birthday parties great for * cat lovers & pet parents * last-minute handmade gifts * stocking stuffers or party favors * teaching kids the joy of handmade giving turn a simple gift card into something unique and memorable with this sweet little cat design for free cat patterns please visit link text 1 1 https //www myfingersflyblog com
